doc.field: Nts'ą̈' k'at'eey jah natihthädn /all/ nadhaktsäł ts'ą̈'.
Nts'ą̈' k'at'eey jah natihthädn /all/ nadhaktsäł ts'ą̈'.
And I wouldn't be standing here wet all over.
